results.doc_title: LEGO: Unified Prospects Checkout Features and Layout for Meal Brands
results.summary: LEGO is an initiative to create a unified prospects checkout experience across all HelloFresh Group meal brands (HelloFresh, GreenChef, EveryPlate, ChefsPlate, Factor, Youfoodz). The project involves modularizing checkout code into reusable unified features and implementing a shared layout to reduce development effort and scale across 8 brands in 18 countries. By H1-2025, the goal is to complete feature modularization and unify layouts for all meal brands.
key_points: Unified checkout will work across all Mealkit brands (HelloFresh, GreenChef, EveryPlate, ChefsPlate) and RTE brands (Factor, Youfoodz)
Scope expanded from 18 to 31 distinct codes to manage after Growth Alliance took over checkout ownership in January 2025
Most checkout features are rolled out: Order Summary, Register Form, Address Form, Delivery Details, Payment Methods, and Unified Layout
HelloFresh 2025 objective #1 is to accelerate product development velocity for RTE brands by distributing ownership across consumer-facing alliances
Social Logins Feature showed neutral results for RTE/WLMK brands with no rollout planned
Register Form Feature is in experiment re-launch phase for HelloFresh
decisions: Activation user journey scope transferred from TAM Alliance to Growth Alliance in January 2025
Social Logins Feature will not be rolled out for RTE/WLMK due to neutral experiment results
US experiment for Register Form is live with rollout decision to be made mid-March
action_items: UFI-9680: Integrate with New Progress bar - Completed ETA Mar 28, 2025
UFI-9678: Remove invalid voucher from payload after first checkout attempt - Completed ETA Mar 28, 2025
UFI-9682: Add check for logged-in user/cart-id and redirect - Completed ETA Mar 28, 2025
UFI-9686: Add lego-checkout applanga group for caching - Completed
UFI-9693: Check requirement for CTA sticky-ness - Not Started
Add tickets to Epic for items that need to be moved to Features (assigned to anupam.maurya@hellofresh.com)
Add spike for layout work consideration (assigned to anupam.maurya@hellofresh.com)
Determine status of specific feature (assigned to harneet.singh@hellofresh.com)
